simplifiedChinese.title: Practical Values of the Kingdom
simplifiedChinese.Question1: What does Jesus teach about forgiveness?
simplifiedChinese.Question2: According to this passage how should we go about restoring broken relationships?
simplifiedChinese.Question3: Is there someone whom you have wronged and you need to ask forgiveness from? Make specific plans to do that.
simplifiedChinese.Question4: Is there someone you need to forgive in your life? Talk to God about it.
